item.title: CVE-2022-26319|2024-08-03T05:03:32.227Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20portable%20security
item.description: An installer search patch element vulnerability in Trend Micro Portable Security 3.0 Pro, 3.0 and 2.0 could allow a local attacker to place an arbitrarily generated DLL file in an installer folder to elevate local privileges. Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute high-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
